nodes.text: Bas-Ton's teahouse was a tea house owned by a Voss named Bas-Ton and his children - a son Phi-Ton and a daughter Yana-Ton. Located in the Judicial Quarter of the Voss-Ka city near the Tower of Prophecy, the tea house was a popular establishment among both the Voss and outsiders alike. At some point prior to 3640 BBY Bas-Ton was kidnapped and killed by the Imperial Intelligence of the reconstituted Sith Empire. His likeness was then used to craft a Human Imperial Agent into an identical copy of Bas-Ton, who would then go and replace him in his life. The Agent led a double life for a long time and maintained the life of the tea house owner as his guise.
Bas-Ton's teahouse appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on Voss.
